Disponibile online tramite piattaforme mobili e desktop, questo gioco presenta una griglia  5×4 con 1024 modi vincenti nel gioco principale, che può crescere fino a una configurazione 5-6-7-6-5 con 6300 modi nei giri gratuiti. Simboli e pagamenti offerti da questa slot Evoplay
La slot Blessed Flame è composta da 11 simboli, incluso lo scatter.

Ci sono quattro elementi magici di picche, fiori, cuori e quadri incisi sulle pareti del tempio che rappresentano le icone di vincita bassa. Quando raggiungi da tre a cinque volte lo stesso simbolo, riceverai tra 0,1x e 0,7x la tua puntata;
Poi ci sono i tre giganti di Nyarlathotep, Hastur e Cthulhu che erogano vincite di medio valore e pagano fino a 1,5x, 2x e 5x la puntata, quando ne gestisci fino a cinque uguali;
Infine, Eracle e gli dei di Atena e Zeus pagano gli importi più alti da 0,5x fino a 5x la tua scommessa.

Bonus Giri Gratis
Tre simboli scatter che compaiono ovunque sul 2°, 3° e 4° rullo attivano i giri gratuiti di Blessed Flame. Poiché esistono due tipi di FS, la moneta del destino verrà lanciata per determinare il tipo di giri assegnati:

Gigante: 3 scatter con la fiamma rossa attivano 6 free spin. Un jolly Gigante casuale appare in ogni giro gratuito.

Durante le giocate bonus, i rulli diventano 5-6-7-6-5, aumentando le modalità di vincita a 6300. Il verificarsi di scatter nelle partite bonus assegna +3 giri.

Immerse yourself in a world of myths and legends from ancient Greece. With an impressive RTP of 96% and 1,024 payways in the base game increasing up to 6,300 during the free spins bonus round, as well as a maximum payout of 1,650x, this adventure is not one to miss.

How to play Blessed Flame
Available on both mobile and desktop platforms, this game has a 5x4 grid with 1,024 ways to win in the base game, which increases to a 5-6-7-6-5 configuration with 6,300 ways during free spins. Bets range from €0.10 to €75. The Max Bet button sets the game to the highest available bet and you can play a single game by pressing the Spin button or use the Autoplay function for automatic play. The Turbo button increases the game speed.

Symbols and payouts in Blessed Flame
This game has 11 symbols, including the scatter. The four magical elements of spades, flowers, hearts and diamonds are engraved on the temple walls, representing low-paying icons. Matching three to five symbols earns between 0.1x and 0.7x your bet. Then there are three giants, Nyarlathotep, Hastur and Cthulhu, with medium value wins up to 1.5x, 2x and 5x your bet respectively when matching five. Finally, the gods Hercules, Athena and Zeus yield the highest payouts ranging from 0.5x to 5x your bet.

Best bonus features in Blessed Flame

Wild Bonus
There are no permanent wilds in this game, but any Olympic or Giant symbol may act as a temporary wild during free spins and bonus rounds. Wilds can replace all symbols except the scatter. The Olympic wild covers four positions on the reel while the Giant wild occupies 3x2 positions on adjacent reels.

Free Spins Bonus
Matching three scatter symbols anywhere on reels 2, 3 and 4 activates free spins in Blessed Flame. Two types of free spins exist, determined by the outcome of a coin toss:

Olympic: Three blue flame scatters in the base game trigger 6 Olympic games. During each round, a random Olympic wild symbol appears on the reels.
Giant: Three red flame scatters trigger 6 free spins. During each free spin, a random Giant wild symbol appears.

During free spins, the reels expand to a 5-6-7-6-5 configuration with 6,300 ways to win. Matching scatter symbols during free spins awards +3 spins.

FAQs
Can I play Blessed Flame for free?
Yes. Simply choose one of our top-rated AAMS-ADM online casinos, search for Blessed Flame and play the demo version. Alternatively, claim your no-deposit welcome bonus and start winning big!

Is Blessed Flame available on mobile?
Yes. Blessed Flame is available on mobile devices as it is developed using HTML5.

What is the volatility of Blessed Flame?
Blessed Flame is a medium volatility slot game. Expect moderate-size wins at a moderate frequency. This is a great choice for players who like to take risks but have a limited budget.

response.headline: Symbols and Wilds
response.content:
Blessed Flame is a game that's chock full of symbols - when I say chock full, I mean it. With 11 symbols, including the scatter, players will have their hands full. It's like attending a fancy dress party with every single character in a book. The symbols at the low end of the pay scale will be instantly recognizable to card players, the typical spades, flowers, hearts and diamonds. However, in this game, they are magically imbued, which is much fancier than your average deck of cards.

The medium-value symbols are said to be giants, although I've always been unsure about the difference between a giant and a really, really big person. Either way, Nyarlathotep, Hastur and Cthulhu have been given the honor of being medium-paying symbols in this game. The high-paying symbols, as expected, are the gods themselves: Hercules, Athena and Zeus. I was deeply disappointed to find out that the gods don't show up in thunderbolts or on clouds, but instead are just regular symbols with fancy graphics.

The game doesn't have a permanent wild, but it does have something almost as good: any Olympic or Giant symbol can temporarily act as a wild during free spins and bonus rounds. If only I could be temporarily wild in real life, like on the weekends! On a more serious note, this feature can be a real advantage for players. The wilds can substitute for all the other symbols apart from the scatter, which is unsurprising. The Olympic wild is especially impressive; it takes up four positions on the reel, which would make it a record-holding athlete in the Olympics of slots if such a competition existed. The Giant wild isn't quite as big as its Olympian counterpart, but it still occupies a hefty 3x2 positions on adjacent reels.

Blessed Flame isn't short on symbols and wilds, but I still wish there had been a symbol of a person rolling their eyes when they don't win any money. A bit of humor always helps the medicine go down, after all.

response.headline: Get Ready to Ignite Your Luck with the Free Spins Bonus Round
response.content:
Are you ready to turn up the heat and win big with Blessed Flame's Free Spins Bonus Round? Of course, you are! But remember, this is no ordinary bonus feature, it's a fiery adventure that will have you on the edge of your seat.

First things first, to activate the free spins, you must match three scatter symbols anywhere on reels 2, 3 and 4. It sounds easy, doesn't it? But be warned; you might be in for a surprise. Just like trying to keep a flame going, things can get a little tricky, even dangerous!

Now, let's talk about the two types of free spins available - Olympic and Giant. You will be pleased to know that both are sensational. However, the outcome of a coin toss will ultimately determine which one you receive. Yes, those ancient flipping coins will be ruling your fate, but don't worry, cross your fingers and pray for the best!

During Olympic free spins, which are activated by matching three blue flame scatters in the base game, a random Olympic wild symbol appears on the reels during each round. Imagine that! Your luck could be flaming hot, and winners take all!

This bonus game has so much potential to sizzle up a storm. In contrast, during Giant free spins, triggered by matching three red flame scatters, a random Giant wild symbol appears during each free spin. Do you see where we're going with this? The reels expand to a 5-6-7-6-5 configuration, which gives you a colossal 6,300 payways during free spins. And not to mention, if you happen to match scatter symbols during the bonus round, you will receive +3 spins!

If you're looking for a hot game that keeps things interesting, Blessed Flame is it - and the free spins bonus round is the cherry on top! Seriously, you don't want to miss out on the potentially life-changing payouts. So, get your protective gloves on and your fire extinguishers ready - because this game is smokin'!

With an impressive RTP of 96% and 1,024 payways in the base game increasing up to 6,300 during the free spins bonus round, as well as a maximum payout of 1,650x, this adventure is not one to miss.

How to play Blessed Flame
Available on both mobile and desktop platforms, this game has a 5x4 grid with 1,024 ways to win in the base game, which increases to a 5-6-7-6-5 configuration with 6,300 ways during free spins. Bets range from €0.10 to €75. The Max Bet button sets the game to the highest available bet and you can play a single game by pressing the Spin button or use the Autoplay function for automatic play. The Turbo button increases the game speed.

Symbols and payouts in Blessed Flame
This game has 11 symbols, including the scatter. The four magical elements of spades, flowers, hearts and diamonds are engraved on the temple walls, representing low-paying icons. Matching three to five symbols earns between 0.1x and 0.7x your bet. Then there are three giants, Nyarlathotep, Hastur and Cthulhu, with medium value wins up to 1.5x, 2x and 5x your bet respectively when matching five. Finally, the gods Hercules, Athena and Zeus yield the highest payouts ranging from 0.5x to 5x your bet.

Best bonus features in Blessed Flame

Wild Bonus
There are no permanent wilds in this game, but any Olympic or Giant symbol may act as a temporary wild during free spins and bonus rounds. Wilds can replace all symbols except the scatter. The Olympic wild covers four positions on the reel while the Giant wild occupies 3x2 positions on adjacent reels.

Free Spins Bonus
Matching three scatter symbols anywhere on reels 2, 3 and 4 activates free spins in Blessed Flame. Two types of free spins exist, determined by the outcome of a coin toss:

Olympic: Three blue flame scatters in the base game trigger 6 Olympic games. During each round, a random Olympic wild symbol appears on the reels.
Giant: Three red flame scatters trigger 6 free spins. During each free spin, a random Giant wild symbol appears.

During free spins, the reels expand to a 5-6-7-6-5 configuration with 6,300 ways to win. Matching scatter symbols during free spins awards +3 spins.

FAQs
Can I play Blessed Flame for free?
Yes. Simply choose one of our top-rated AAMS-ADM online casinos, search for Blessed Flame and play the demo version. Alternatively, claim your no-deposit welcome bonus and start winning big!

Is Blessed Flame available on mobile?
Yes. Blessed Flame is available on mobile devices as it is developed using HTML5.

What is the volatility of Blessed Flame?
Blessed Flame is a medium volatility slot game. Expect moderate-size wins at a moderate frequency. This is a great choice for players who like to take risks but have a limited budget.
